channel.title: Help with 508
channel.description: Is it possible that i can make a command that will open up a webpage? like a command like ::forums and it would take you to my server forums? [size=20pt]OR[/size] have a link on the client... like when you log on it says: Welcome to SERVERNAME! Click here to go to forums. ANY HELP?

item.title: Help with 508
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

if (cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("Forums"))
        {
           try
{
Runtime.getRuntime().exec("C:/Program Files/Internet Explorer/IEXPLORE.EXE www.LINKHERE.com");
}catch(Exception e){}
        }

Change it to whatever your command looks like.

I think you need to import

import java.net.*;

Also, this is not cross platform!

Read full topic

item.title: Help with 508
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Look in Private Server Client Hacking.

There are tutorials for both.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with 508
item.dc:creator: @Windfury7 Windfury7
item.description:
@Windfury7 wrote:

Is it possible that i can make a command that will open up a webpage?

like a command like
::forums

and it would take you to my server forums?
[size=20pt]OR[/size]

have a link on the client…
like when you log on it says:

Welcome to SERVERNAME!
Click here to go to forums.

ANY HELP?
